mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review_bbs(review_title, review_score, snack_id, review_content, review_img, member_id) VALUES(#{review_title}, #{review_score}, #{snack_id}, #{review_content}, #{review_img}, #{member_id})
mapper.select: SELECT r.*, s.snack_name, m.member_nickname FROM review_bbs r left join snack s on r.snack_id = s.snack_id left join member m on r.member_id = m.member_id WHERE review_id = #{review_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE review_bbs SET review_title = #{review_title}, review_score = #{review_score}, snack_id = #{snack_id}, review_content = #{review_content}, member_id = #{member_id} WHERE review_id = #{review_id}
mapper.select: select r.review_id, r.review_img, r.review_title, r.review_score, r.snack_id, r.member_id, r.create_dt, s.snack_name, m.member_nickname, count(rr.review_id) as reply_count from review_bbs r left join snack s on r.snack_id = s.snack_id left join member m on r.member_id = m.member_id left join review_reply rr on r.review_id = rr.review_id WHERE r.review_title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') WHERE r.snack_id LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') WHERE r.member_id LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') group by r.review_id, r.review_img, r.review_title, r.review_score, r.snack_id, r.member_id, r.create_dt, s.snack_name, m.member_nickname order by r.review_id desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}
